thag6.6:1.3_0: I have not found peace of mind,
thag6.6:1.4_0: even as long as a finger-snap.
thag6.6:2.1_0: Since I couldn’t get my mind unified,
thag6.6:2.2_0: I was racked by desire for pleasures of the senses.
thag6.6:3.1_0: Shall I ... or shall I slit my wrists?
thag6.6:3.3_0: For how on earth can one such as me die
thag6.6:4.1_0: Then I picked up a razor,
thag6.6:6.2_0: Just one rainy season after I went forth,
thag6.6:6.5_0: the senior monk should be revered,
